plays.text: Goal scored by Zack Stortini assisted by Kyle Brodziak and Marc Pouliot
Penalty to Paul Kariya 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Curtis Glencross
Penalty to Eric Brewer 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Jarret Stoll (Power Play) assisted by Sam Gagner and Dustin Penner
Penalty to Yan Stastny 2 minutes for Slashing Robert Nilsson
Goal scored by Sam Gagner (Power Play) assisted by Ales Hemsky and Joni Pitkanen
Penalty to Marc Pouliot 2 minutes for Hooking Barret Jackman
Goal scored by Andy McDonald (Power Play) assisted by Brad Boyes and Erik Johnson
Goal scored by Lee Stempniak assisted by David Backes and Andy McDonald
Goal scored by Brad Boyes assisted by Paul Kariya
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice
Penalty to Cam Janssen 2 minutes for Roughing Tom Gilbert
Penalty to Ladislav Smid 2 minutes for High-sticking Brad Boyes
Goal scored by Andrew Cogliano assisted by Sam Gagner
